Text: It seems everyone feels the opposite but this keeps letting me down, the art is sub-par - like someone who has only glanced a batman comic drew it and the Cheap shock gags are not a replacement for story... Sigh
Really? #1 was my personal favourite of the nu52's
Have to read it,but #1 was a huge leftdown...tony daniel is'nt bad artist but his writing is blah...
